PID Object¶

class pid_object.PID_Object(kp, ki, kd, min_output, max_output, min_input, max_input, sample_time)¶
_PID_Object__check_time()¶

__check_time Checks if the PID should be updated and updates local variable time

Returns

True if the PID should be updated, False if not

Return type

bool

_PID_Object__error_update(input)¶

__error_update Updates the error and delta error

Parameters

input (float) – Input value to be checked against the setpoint

__init__(kp, ki, kd, min_output, max_output, min_input, max_input, sample_time)¶

__init__ Initializes the PID Object and starts disabled, in manual mode.

Parameters

  • kp (float) – Proportional Gain

  • ki (float) – Integral Gain

  • kd (float) – Derivative Gain

  • min_output (float) – Boundary for the minimum value of the output, minimum is 0.0

  • max_output (float) – Boundary for the maximum value of the output, maximum is 1.0

  • min_input (float) – Boundary for the input, unbounded

  • max_input (float) – Boundary for the max input, unbounded

  • sample_time (float) – The time in milliseconds that the PID output should be updated

clear()¶

clear Sets all values to 0 upon initialization

disable()¶

disable Dusable the PID Object

enable()¶

enable Enables the PID Object

get_output()¶

get_output Returns the value of the output

Returns

Value of the output being commanded from the PID

Return type

float

set_auto()¶

set_auto Setter for the auto mode

set_input_high(enghigh)¶

set_input_high Setter for the maximum input value

Parameters

enghigh (float) – Maximum input value

set_input_low(englow)¶

set_input_low Setter for the minimum input value

Parameters

englow (float) – Minimum input value

set_kd(kd)¶

set_kd Setter for the derivative gain

Parameters

kd (float) – Derivative Gain

set_ki(ki)¶

set_ki Setter for the integral gain

Parameters

ki (float) – Integral Gain

set_kp(kp)¶

set_kp Setter for the proportional gain

Parameters

kp (float) – Proportional Gain

set_manual()¶

set_manual Setter for the manual mode

set_max_output(max_output)¶

set_max_output Setter for the maximum output value

Parameters

max_output (float) – Maximum output value

set_min_output(min_output)¶

set_min_output Setter for the minimum output value

Parameters

min_output (float) – Minimum output value

set_output(output)¶

set_output Setter for the output if in manual mode

Parameters

output (_type_) –

set_sampletime(sampletime)¶

set_sampletime Setter for the Sample Time

Parameters

sampletime (float) – Time in milliseconds that the PID output should be updated

set_setpoint(setpoint)¶

set_setpoint Setter for the setpoint

Parameters

setpoint (float) – Setpoint value

update(input)¶

update Updates the PID Output

Parameters

input (float) – The input value to be checked against the setpoint

Returns

The output value from 0-100

Return type

float
